title: Crime: senior alert
creator_credit: Ronald Floethe, Gordon Kerkhoff and AIMS Instructional Media
brief_description: Crime against the elderly is on the increase. This film offers sensible information which, if followed, will help protect them against the potential criminal. Gives tips on preventing residential burglary, purse snatchers, developing safe car habits and avoiding high-risk areas.
